overview:
Rynaldo Stoltz is a South African (Cape Town born and raised) developer, blogger, and online marketer. He is also the owner of Red Coal Media SA as well as virtusa, a South African based web startup similar to Digg where users can submit, share, and discover just about anything on the web.

Rynaldo is also an active member in dozens of support forums ranging from marketing, making money online, as well as PHP coding and development and has helped thousands of people reach online success.

A true online marketing guru !
